post.summary: Add or update a SAT report for an archive
post.description: Adds or updates the SAT (System Acceptance Testing) report for a specific archived release. The total of all percentage fields must equal 100 to save, or 0 to clear the report.

201.description: SAT report saved or updated successfully.

post.summary: Complete an 'archive_only' release
post.description: Moves all requirements from an 'archive_only' release to a 'Done' state, effectively changing its status to 'archive_and_complete'. This is for releases that were archived without completing the items first.

200.description: Archived release has been successfully completed.

400.description: The release was not of type 'archive_only'.

get.summary: Calculate KPIs for a FAT period
get.description: Calculates key performance indicators (DRE, MTTD, MTTR) for a specific FAT period based on its associated defects. This is a real-time calculation.

get.description: Retrieves the KPIs (DRE, MTTD, MTTR) that were calculated and stored when the FAT period was completed.

post.summary: Synchronize data with the vector database
post.description: Triggers a full synchronization of project data (requirements, defects, etc.) with the vector database for the chatbot to use. This can be a long-running process. The server will respond immediately while the sync runs in the background.

post.summary: Send a query to the chatbot
post.description: Asks a question to the AI chatbot. The chatbot uses the synchronized data to answer questions about projects, requirements, defects, and more.

ActivityUpdateInput.description: Fields to update for an activity log. At least one must be provided.

id.description: ID of the archived release record.

original_release_id.description: ID of the original release that was archived.

closed_at.description: Timestamp when the release was closed and archived.

metrics.description: Metrics captured at the time of archiving.

doneCount.description: Number of requirements marked 'Done' in the release.

notDoneCount.description: Number of requirements not marked 'Done' in the release.

sat_report.description: The SAT (System Acceptance Testing) report associated with this archive, if available.

fat_execution_report.description: The FAT execution report associated with this archive at the time of completion, if available.

close_action.description: The action taken when the release was closed.

id.description: ID of the archived release item record.

requirement_group_id.description: The ID of the requirement group.

requirement_title.description: The title of the requirement at the time of archiving.

final_status.description: The final status of the requirement at the time of archiving.

message.description: The natural language question for the chatbot.
message.example: What is the status of requirement 'REQ-123'?

projectContext.description: Optional project name to provide context for the query.

reply.description: The chatbot's answer to the query.

data_changed.description: Indicates if the query resulted in a database modification.

new_item.description: Details of the newly created item, if any.

synced.description: The number of documents successfully synchronized.

is_fat_defect.description: 1 if it's a FAT defect, 0 otherwise.
Set to true if this is a FAT defect.
Set to true if this is a FAT defect.

dre.description: Defect Removal Efficiency, as a percentage string (e.g., '95.50').

mttd.description: Mean Time To Detect, in days (e.g., '1.25').

mttr.description: Mean Time To Repair, in days (e.g., '3.50').

start_date.description: The start date for the FAT period.

release_id.description: The ID of the single active release to be tested.

token.description: Jira Personal Access Token (optional if already saved)

saveToken.description: Whether to save the token for future use

closed_at.description: Timestamp when the release was closed, if applicable.

fat_execution_report.description: The execution report from the latest completed FAT period this release was a part of, if available.

closeAction.description: Action to take upon closing the release. 'archive_only' archives the release and unlinks requirements. 'archive_and_complete' archives the release and marks linked requirements as 'Done'.

project.description: Project must be sent for is_current logic

reason.description: The reason for the scope change.

changeCount.description: The number of logged scope changes for this requirement.

isActive.description: Indicates if the requirement is currently active. It is false if its current status is 'Done' as part of an 'archive_and_complete' release action.

details.description: Additional details or context for the item.
Additional details or context for the item.
Additional details or context for the item.

title.description: The title of the SAT bug.

link.description: A URL link to the bug tracking system (e.g., Jira).

estimation.description: The estimated effort for the bug.

estimation_unit.description: The unit for the estimation ('h' for hours, 'd' for days).
